function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants in marginalized areas may have less concern about COVID-19.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and potential for a lack of preventive measures.","Mitigation":"Provide targeted education and resources for marginalized communities.","Technologies":"Remote education tools, community outreach programs.","People":"Individuals living in marginalized areas.","Owner":"Health organizations, local governments."},{"Description":"More information about COVID-19 can lead to increased anxiety and worry.","Impact":"Negative effect on mental health and well-being.","Mitigation":"Offer balanced and accurate information, mental health support services.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps.","People":"General public, especially those consuming a lot of information about COVID-19.","Owner":"Media organizations, mental health professionals."},{"Description":"Variability in COVID-19 prevention and mitigation practices among participants.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and ineffective control measures.","Mitigation":"Targeted education on preventive measures, access to resources for practice implementation.","Technologies":"Remote training, surveillance and monitoring systems.","People":"Participants in the study and their communities.","Owner":"Health organizations, local governments."}]}
